code:
-spec min_operations(Nums1 :: [integer()], Nums2 :: [integer()]) -> integer().
min_operations(Nums1, Nums2) ->
    Max1 = lists:max(Nums1),
    Max2 = lists:max(Nums2),
    Len = length(Nums1),
    Last1 = lists:nth(Len, Nums1),
    Last2 = lists:nth(Len, Nums2),
    if 
        Max1 =:= Last1 andalso Max2 =:= Last2 -> 0;
        true ->
            PossibleSwaps = lists:filter(fun(I) -> 
                (Nums1 -- [lists:nth(I, Nums1)] ++ [lists:nth(I, Nums2)]) =:= lists:sort(Nums1) andalso
                (Nums2 -- [lists:nth(I, Nums2)] ++ [lists:nth(I, Nums1)]) =:= lists:sort(Nums2)
            end, lists:seq(1, Len)),
            case PossibleSwaps of
                [_|_] -> 1;
                [] -> -1
            end
    end.
